thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net
thread.title: Adam

author: Adam
title: Adam
text:
I have to say at first I was hesitant and cautious before pulling the trigger to buy a Windows OEM Key for my new gaming build. I did some background reviews first as any seasoned shopper would do and what I can say is that for the most part the process went smoothly. I had some difficulty with using Paypal but otherwise no issues with credit card transactions. The good side is that once payment was processed I received the key within five minutes in my email.
So far quite pleased with promises kept by the vendor. I will buy again from Gamecheap.com.
